```{python}
with open("shakespeare.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    text = f.read()
```

```{python}
first_words = text.split()[:1000]
print(first_words)
print(first_words[499])
```

```{python}
chosen_ones = ['all-eating', 'thy', 'the', 'And', 'or', 'all', 'cruel', 'treasure', 'tattered', 'of']
print(chosen_ones)
```

```{python}
bill = text.split()
word_counts = {"all-eating": bill.count("all-eating"), 
'thy': bill.count("thy"),
'the': bill.count("the"),
'And': bill.count("And"),
'or': bill.count("or"),
'all': bill.count("all"),
'cruel': bill.count("cruel"),
'treasure': bill.count("treasure"),
'tattered': bill.count("tattered"),
'of': bill.count("of")}
print(word_counts)
```
